content: >crocheted fruit and vegetable basket is fun to stitch and a creative way to bring a touch of summer to brighten your kitchen * coats & clark * wr1070 crocheted fruits & vegetables basket skill level easy gauge 4 single_crochet = 1 1/4 4 row = 1 grapes tlc® essentials™ small amounts of no 2533 dark plum ca no 2335 taupe cb no 2673 medium thyme cc grapes measure approx 1 5 in diameter banana tlc® essentials™ 1/2 oz of no 2220 butter ca small amount of no 2335 taupe cb banana measures approx 8 long x 5 in diameter apple tlc® essentials™ 1/2 oz of no 2913 ranch red ca small amounts of no 2675 dark thyme cb and no 2368 dark brown cc apple measures approx 3 high x 1 in diameter orange tlc® essentials™ 1/2 oz of no 2254 persimmon ca small amount of no 2335 taupe cb orange measures approx 9 5 in diameter pear tlc® essentials™ 1/2 oz of no 2615 light celery ca small amount of no 2335 taupe cb pear measures approx 4 5 high x 8 5 in diameter tomato tlc® essentials™ 1/2 oz of no 2319 cherry red ca small amount of no 2675 dark thyme cb tomato measures approx 9 in diameter celery tlc® essentials™ small amount of no 2615 lt celery celery measures approx 7 long x 1 wide olive tlc® essentials™ small amount of no 2673 med thyme and no 2254 persimmon olives measures approx 1 5 high x 3 5 in diameter carrot tlc® essentials™ small amount of no 2254 persimmon ca and no 2673 med thyme cb carrot measures approx 7 x 3 5 in diameter black basket tlc® essentials™ 3 ½ oz of no 2112 black basket measures approx 4 high x 24 in diameter
